channel.title: Pastor Rick's Daily Hope
channel.description: Rick Warren is an innovative pastor, renowned author, and global influencer.
channel.itunes:author: PastorRick.com
channel.itunes:summary: Rick Warren is an innovative pastor, renowned author, and global influencer.

item.itunes:title: Doing a Reset for a Better Life - Part 3
item.title: Doing a Reset for a Better Life - Part 3
item.description: As God moves you toward a better life, you probably want change to happen fast—a total makeover in an hour. But God is not in a hurry because he’s interested in growing your character. God grows you by using incremental change—and that incremental change is called sanctification.

item.itunes:title: Doing a Reset for a Better Life - Part 2
item.title: Doing a Reset for a Better Life - Part 2
item.description: God is a God of newness. He doesn't do the same old things all the time. To live a better life, you need to cooperate with the new things God wants to do in your family, in your career, in your friendships, in his church, and in the world around you.

item.itunes:title: Doing a Reset for a Better Life - Part 1
item.title: Doing a Reset for a Better Life - Part 1
item.description: God wants you to live a life of intention, focusing on what really matters. Join Pastor Rick as he explains the secret to an effective and fulfilling life.

item.itunes:title: Resuming Life After a Captivity - Part 2
item.title: Resuming Life After a Captivity - Part 2
item.description: Don't be in a rush to restart everything all at once just because you have the freedom to do it. What is the best use of your time and your life? Join Pastor Rick as he teaches why you need to stop doing some things in order to do the things God wants you to do.

item.itunes:title: Resuming Life After a Captivity - Part 1
item.title: Resuming Life After a Captivity - Part 1
item.description: God never wants you to waste an experience, not even a painful one. What lessons have you learned while you were in captivity? In this broadcast, Pastor Rick talks about why God wants you to focus on what matters most as you return to your new life.

item.itunes:title: Radical Freedom - Part 4
item.title: Radical Freedom - Part 4
item.description: Every day you have a choice. You can walk in freedom or in bondage. How do you choose to be free? Join Pastor Rick as he finds the answer to that question in God’s Word.

item.itunes:title: Radical Freedom - Part 3
item.title: Radical Freedom - Part 3
item.description: What does it mean to find true freedom in Christ? Join Pastor Rick as he teaches how the Holy Spirit guides you toward radical freedom.

item.itunes:title: Radical Freedom - Part 2
item.title: Radical Freedom - Part 2
item.description: You have the freedom to say no to things that mess up your life—and the freedom to say yes to things that build up your life. Join Pastor Rick as he teaches about the radical freedom you have in Christ.

item.itunes:title: Radical Freedom - Part 1
item.title: Radical Freedom - Part 1
item.description: You have the freedom to talk to God anytime you want. Join Pastor Rick as he explains how you get that access when you become part of God’s family.

item.itunes:title: Radical Generosity - Part 2
item.title: Radical Generosity - Part 2
item.description: Jesus says, “Your heart will be where your treasure is” (Matthew 6:21 NCV). When you give yourself to Jesus, it makes you love him more. Find out why, as Pastor Rick teaches more about radical generosity.

item.itunes:title: Radical Generosity - Part 1
item.title: Radical Generosity - Part 1
item.description: One mark of maturity is when you begin to understand that there really is more joy in giving than in getting. Join Pastor Rick as he teaches from the Bible about radical generosity.

item.itunes:title: Radical Hope - Part 3
item.title: Radical Hope - Part 3
item.description: Because of Jesus, you can have hope that God will protect you with his mighty power and that you are being prepared for eternity. Join Pastor Rick as he continues to teach more about radical hope.

item.itunes:title: Radical Hope - Part 2
item.title: Radical Hope - Part 2
item.description: No matter what you’re going through right now and no matter what you will go through in the days ahead, you cannot lose your salvation. God is holding on to you with his grip of grace. Join Pastor Rick as he teaches more about the radical hope we find in Jesus.

item.itunes:title: Radical Hope - Part 1
item.title: Radical Hope - Part 1
item.description: Did you know that if you are a believer, God always acts in mercy toward you? Why? Because you are covered in the blood and salvation of Jesus Christ. And that gives you hope. Join Pastor Rick as he teaches from God’s Word.

item.itunes:title: Radical Joy - Part 3
item.title: Radical Joy - Part 3
item.description: Jesus says, “Ask, using my name, and you will receive, and you will have abundant joy” (John 16:24 NLT). Join Pastor Rick as he teaches how prayer can lead to radical joy.

item.itunes:title: Radical Joy - Part 2
item.title: Radical Joy - Part 2
item.description: Do you constantly ask yourself, “Am I making the right decision? Am I doing the right thing?” Join Pastor Rick as he teaches that, no matter how bad things are in your life, you can know for certain that God will use it all for good.

item.itunes:title: Radical Joy - Part 1
item.title: Radical Joy - Part 1
item.description: God says there’s no condemnation for those who are in Christ. That means God isn’t mad at you and he’s not trying to get even with you. Join Pastor Rick as he explains how God’s grace can give you radical joy.

item.itunes:title: Radical Faith - Part 3
item.title: Radical Faith - Part 3
item.description: Real faith develops in the valleys of life, not on the mountaintops. Join Pastor Rick as he explains how God uses the pain, the hurt, and the difficulties in your life to shape you into the person he created you to be.

item.itunes:title: Radical Faith - Part 2
item.title: Radical Faith - Part 2
item.description: Giving and faith go together. Join Pastor Rick as he teaches why you can trust God to provide for you when you put him first in your life.

item.itunes:title: Radical Faith - Part 1
item.title: Radical Faith - Part 1
item.description: Find out how God blesses you when you obey him, even when you don’t understand. Join Pastor Rick as he teaches from God’s Word.

item.itunes:title: Radical Gratitude - Part 4
item.title: Radical Gratitude - Part 4
item.description: Pastor Rick teaches that faith is thanking God in advance for his answer to your prayers. Learn more about how radical gratitude will transform your prayer life.

item.itunes:title: Radical Gratitude - Part 3
item.title: Radical Gratitude - Part 3
item.description: Join Pastor Rick as he teaches more about how to be grateful in every situation and how that attitude can change the world.

item.itunes:title: Radical Gratitude - Part 2
item.title: Radical Gratitude - Part 2
item.description: The Bible says you should give thanks in all circumstances. How? Join Pastor Rick as he finds the answer to that question in God’s Word.

item.itunes:title: Radical Gratitude - Part 1
item.title: Radical Gratitude - Part 1
item.description: The Bible says you’re blessed when you trust God and place your hope and confidence in him. Doing this allows you to grow deep roots into his Word, cultivating a constant gratefulness for what he does in your life. Join Pastor Rick as he teaches from God’s Word.

item.itunes:title: How to Be Certain You’re Going to Heaven - Part 4
item.title: How to Be Certain You’re Going to Heaven - Part 4
item.description: Join Pastor Rick as he continues to explain why Jesus had to come to Earth and die to create a bridge between God and us.

item.itunes:title: How to Be Certain You’re Going to Heaven - Part 3
item.title: How to Be Certain You’re Going to Heaven - Part 3
item.description: The greatest gift you’ve ever been given wasn’t bought in a store, yet it cost the Giver everything. In this message, Pastor Rick explains why Jesus had to come to Earth and die so that you could be made right with God—and how you can accept his great gift of grace.

item.itunes:title: How to Be Certain You’re Going to Heaven - Part 2
item.title: How to Be Certain You’re Going to Heaven - Part 2
item.description: There’s only one thing in the entire universe that won’t change: God’s love. Through this broadcast, Pastor Rick wants you to understand God’s extravagant, lavish love for you so that it will provide a rock-solid foundation for your life.

item.itunes:title: How to Be Certain You’re Going to Heaven - Part 1
item.title: How to Be Certain You’re Going to Heaven - Part 1
item.description: God doesn’t want you to doubt your salvation. He doesn’t want you to wonder whether you’ll be in heaven with him. God wants you to settle the issue. Pastor Rick uses this message to help you do that by getting back to the basics of the Gospel.

item.itunes:title: The Reality of Heaven - Part 4
item.title: The Reality of Heaven - Part 4
item.description: Have you ever wondered what heaven is going to be like? Pastor Rick gives you a small glimpse into heaven in this message as he shares four descriptions of heaven and what you need to do to accept God’s gift of eternal life in heaven with him.

item.itunes:title: The Reality of Heaven - Part 3
item.title: The Reality of Heaven - Part 3
item.description: The Bible describes many significant things about heaven—but the most profound part of the description may be what it says won’t be there. In this message, Pastor Rick gives five pieces of our earthly existence that won’t be part of our heavenly one.

item.itunes:title: The Reality of Heaven - Part 2
item.title: The Reality of Heaven - Part 2
item.description: Although human words can’t properly explain the divine mysteries of heaven, we do know a little about what heaven will be like. In this broadcast, Pastor Rick shares five things we know about heaven from the Bible and why it’s a place you want to be.

item.itunes:title: The Reality of Heaven - Part 1
item.title: The Reality of Heaven - Part 1
item.description: Heaven is the place God is designing for his family. You and I were made for heaven, but we have many misconceptions about what heaven is like. Join Pastor Rick for this message as he talks about a right view of heaven.

item.itunes:title: The Reality of Hell - Part 4
item.title: The Reality of Hell - Part 4
item.description: If you ask people if they are going to heaven or hell, you’ll likely hear them say, “I hope I’ll go to heaven.” But hope just isn’t enough. In this broadcast, Pastor Rick helps you understand why choosing where you spend eternity is the most important decision you will ever make.

item.itunes:title: The Reality of Hell - Part 3
item.title: The Reality of Hell - Part 3
item.description: Spiritual realities are more real than physical ones—so you need to focus on the spiritual ones. Pastor Rick uses this message to walk through the five specific spiritual realities you need to take to heart to alter your eternal destiny and the way you live in this life.

item.itunes:title: The Reality of Hell - Part 2
item.title: The Reality of Hell - Part 2
item.description: Based on how Jesus and others in the Bible describe hell, you don’t want to have any part of it. In this message, Pastor Rick talks about what the Bible says about hell and how you can avoid spending eternity away from God.

item.itunes:title: The Reality of Hell - Part 1
item.title: The Reality of Hell - Part 1
item.description: Heaven is perfect. And because each person is made for eternity and no one is perfect, there must be a place for evil to spend eternity. In this message, Pastor Rick shares how the existence of evil proves the necessity of hell.

item.itunes:title: Why God Made You! - Part 4
item.title: Why God Made You! - Part 4
item.description: Just like every snowflake is different, God created you to be unique. There has never been anyone else like you, and there never will be anyone else like you. Pastor Rick explains why God uniquely shaped you to fulfill a specific purpose here on earth.

item.itunes:title: Why God Made You! - Part 3
item.title: Why God Made You! - Part 3
item.description: Have you ever thought about this: If God wants to take you to heaven, why doesn’t he just take you there instantly once you become a believer? Why does God put you on this planet for so many years? Join Pastor Rick as he teaches what the Bible says about why God made you.

item.itunes:title: Why God Made You! - Part 2
item.title: Why God Made You! - Part 2
item.description: You were made by God, and you were made for God. Until you understand that, your life will never make sense. You’ve got to start with God. Pastor Rick continues to teach how the Bible answers the question: “What on earth am I here for?”

item.itunes:title: Why God Made You! - Part 1
item.title: Why God Made You! - Part 1
item.description: The only way you’re ever going to know the purpose for your life—why you’re here on this planet, and what on earth you’re here for—is to talk to your Creator, God, and to read his Word, the Bible. Pastor Rick continues to teach that your purpose starts with God.

item.itunes:title: I’m Called to Be Sent
item.title: I’m Called to Be Sent
item.description: In this broadcast, Pastor Rick explains why your destiny has eternal significance not just for yourself but also for other people. Nothing you do will ever matter as much as helping people establish an eternal relationship with God. This is why you must have an urgency about knowing your destiny and completing your mission.

item.itunes:title: You Are Called to Bless
item.title: You Are Called to Bless
item.description: There’s almost nothing that God won’t do for the person who really wants to help others. In this broadcast, Pastor Rick shares God’s promises of what he will do for the person who is committed to blessing and helping other people.

item.itunes:title: You Are Called to Become - Part 3
item.title: You Are Called to Become - Part 3
item.description: In this broadcast, Pastor Rick explains how your spiritual gifts were not given for your own benefit but for the benefit of others, just as other people were given gifts for your benefit. “There are different kinds of service, but we serve the same Lord” (1 Corinthians 12:5 NLT).

item.itunes:title: You Are Called to Become - Part 2
item.title: You Are Called to Become - Part 2
item.description: One of life’s frustrations is that God’s timetable is rarely the same as ours. We are often in a hurry when God isn’t. In this message, Pastor Rick teaches how to be patient with the process as God continually works in your life to prepare you for your role in eternity.

item.itunes:title: You Are Called to Become - Part 1
item.title: You Are Called to Become - Part 1
item.description: Today we’re obsessed with speed, but God is more interested in strength and stability than swiftness. Real maturity is never the result of a single experience, no matter how powerful or moving. Join Pastor Rick as he walks through the ways to gradually develop the habits of Christlike character.

item.itunes:title: You Are Called to Belong - Part 3
item.title: You Are Called to Belong - Part 3
item.description: Jesus isn’t ashamed to call you his brother or sister, no matter how messed up your life is, because you belong to God’s family. In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches that if you’re a member of the family of God, your sin doesn’t define you anymore and why that truth brings freedom to your life.

item.itunes:title: You Are Called to Belong - Part 2
item.title: You Are Called to Belong - Part 2
item.description: You were created for community, fashioned for fellowship, and formed for a family, and no one can fulfill God’s purposes alone. Pastor Rick shares in this message why we need to recover and practice the biblical meaning of membership.

item.itunes:title: You Are Called to Belong - Part 1
item.title: You Are Called to Belong - Part 1
item.description: Today’s culture of rampant individualism has created many spiritual orphans—“bunny believers” who hop around from one church to another without any identity, accountability, or commitment. In this message, Pastor Rick explains why being part of a community of believers is so important to your spiritual walk.

item.itunes:title: Called to Be Loved - Part 3
item.title: Called to Be Loved - Part 3
item.description: In this message, Pastor Rick explains just how much God loves you and why the spiritually lost are worth God’s rescue mission. People are only “lost” if they’re worth finding! Think of it this way: The value of a masterpiece doesn’t go down when it’s lost; it goes up.

item.itunes:title: Called to Be Loved - Part 2
item.title: Called to Be Loved - Part 2
item.description: The Bible says, “We love because he first loved us” (1 John 4:19 NIV). In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches why you have to begin with God’s nature to be able to understand your life’s purpose and calling.

item.itunes:title: Called to Be Loved - Part 1
item.title: Called to Be Loved - Part 1
item.description: God not only knows where you are; he also knows who you are. He knows what you’re going through, why you’re going through it, and how you feel about it. He knows you better than you know yourself! Pastor Rick uses this message to help you understand just how much Jesus wants to affirm you and show you his love.

item.itunes:title: The Call Is for You - Part 2
item.title: The Call Is for You - Part 2
item.description: You were made to be you. God has given you unique abilities, and he wants you to use them according to his purposes. In this message, Pastor Rick explains how your abilities are the roadmap to God’s will for your life.

item.itunes:title: The Call Is for You - Part 1
item.title: The Call Is for You - Part 1
item.description: Growing up, you may have thought that being called by God was something only missionaries, pastors, nuns, and other full-time church workers experienced. Join Pastor Rick as he teaches what the Bible says about every Christian’s call to service.

item.itunes:title: God’s Five Purposes for Your Life - Part 3
item.title: God’s Five Purposes for Your Life - Part 3
item.description: One of the things you can’t do in heaven is share the Good News of Jesus with others. That’s why God has given us the work of sharing the Gospel while on Earth. Listen to this message by Pastor Rick as he continues to examine God’s purposes for your life.

item.itunes:title: God’s Five Purposes for Your Life - Part 2
item.title: God’s Five Purposes for Your Life - Part 2
item.description: God doesn’t want you to live for yourself—to consume resources, take up space, and then die. Instead, he wants you to contribute something back. Join Pastor Rick as he continues to examine God’s purposes for your life.

item.itunes:title: God’s Five Purposes for Your Life - Part 1
item.title: God’s Five Purposes for Your Life - Part 1
item.description: God created you to love him and love his family. He wants you to live a life centered around him. In this broadcast, Pastor Rick examines God’s purposes for your life.

item.itunes:title: Learning My True Identity in Christ - Part 2
item.title: Learning My True Identity in Christ - Part 2
item.description: Because of what Jesus did on the cross, you are capable of handling anything in life. Why? Because you can do all things through Christ who gives you strength. Join Pastor Rick as he tells you the truth about your real identity.

item.itunes:title: Learning My True Identity in Christ - Part 1
item.title: Learning My True Identity in Christ - Part 1
item.description: Rejection from others and feelings of worthlessness can rob you of seeing your true value. Listen to this broadcast by Pastor Rick and discover how infinitely valuable you are to God in Christ Jesus.

item.itunes:title: Your Timing Is Everything - Part 3
item.title: Your Timing Is Everything - Part 3
item.description: There’s one thing everyone should be slow at doing, and that’s becoming angry. James 1:19 says, “Be quick to listen, slow to speak, and slow to get angry” (NLT). Continue listening to Pastor Rick as he explains the importance of keeping in step with God’s timing.

item.itunes:title: Your Timing Is Everything - Part 2
item.title: Your Timing Is Everything - Part 2
item.description: Sometimes you need to move slow in life; other times you need to move fast. Either way, it’s a skill you must learn. Listen to this message by Pastor Rick as he continues talking about why timing is everything in life.

item.itunes:title: Your Timing Is Everything - Part 1
item.title: Your Timing Is Everything - Part 1
item.description: Every great accomplishment involves an element of timing. We can sometimes do the right thing and have the wrong timing—or have the right timing and do it the wrong way. In this broadcast, Pastor Rick shows you how to be sensitive to God’s timing.

item.itunes:title: What Destroys Relationships and What Builds Them - Part 3
item.title: What Destroys Relationships and What Builds Them - Part 3
item.description: Join Pastor Rick as he continues to teach the biblical ways to build positive, healthy relationships.

item.itunes:title: What Destroys Relationships and What Builds Them - Part 2
item.title: What Destroys Relationships and What Builds Them - Part 2
item.description: Join Pastor Rick as he teaches how the key to developing friendships is focusing on others and learning to support them. Small groups are a perfect place to learn and practice relational skills.

item.itunes:title: What Destroys Relationships and What Builds Them - Part 1
item.title: What Destroys Relationships and What Builds Them - Part 1
item.description: We all have relationship problems, but God gives us clear answers in his Word for how to get past the selfishness, pride, insecurity, or resentment that undermines our ability to build healthy relationships.

item.itunes:title: Becoming Best Friends with God - Part 3
item.title: Becoming Best Friends with God - Part 3
item.description: God will sometimes allow you to go through difficult times in order to draw you closer to him. He wants you to learn to trust in him. In this broadcast, Pastor Rick examines what it means to become best friends with God.

item.itunes:title: Becoming Best Friends with God - Part 2
item.title: Becoming Best Friends with God - Part 2
item.description: Friendship with God is like any other friendship: You have to make time for it. Learn the importance of having a daily quiet time with God in this message by Pastor Rick.

item.itunes:title: Becoming Best Friends with God - Part 1
item.title: Becoming Best Friends with God - Part 1
item.description: You can be the most famous, most successful, and most accomplished person on the planet. But if you don’t know and love God, you’ve missed the purpose of your life. Join Pastor Rick as he helps you build a friendship with God.

item.itunes:title: Fighting for an Awesome Family - Part 4
item.title: Fighting for an Awesome Family - Part 4
item.description: One mark of an awesome family is when they get together to serve God and others. In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches that families were made by God for a mission.

item.itunes:title: Fighting for an Awesome Family - Part 3
item.title: Fighting for an Awesome Family - Part 3
item.description: It’s easy to criticize and compare one another in a family, saying things like, “Why can’t you be more like your father—or more like your sister?” Join Pastor Rick as he gives several reasons why healthy family relationships are worth fighting for.

item.itunes:title: Fighting for an Awesome Family - Part 2
item.title: Fighting for an Awesome Family - Part 2
item.description: Many families are just average. One reason is because they don’t talk about important things, such as God’s Word. In this message, Pastor Rick teaches how to have an awesome family.

item.itunes:title: Fighting for an Awesome Family - Part 1
item.title: Fighting for an Awesome Family - Part 1
item.description: Many skills are learned in family relationships, including how to handle emotions, how to handle conflict, and how to handle loss. Learn how families help each other grow in this broadcast by Pastor Rick.

item.itunes:title: Fighting For an Awesome Marriage - Part 4
item.title: Fighting For an Awesome Marriage - Part 4
item.description: There’s great joy that comes from a long-term relationship and growing old with someone you know and love deeply. In this message, Pastor Rick continues to teach about awesome marriages.

item.itunes:title: Fighting For an Awesome Marriage - Part 3
item.title: Fighting For an Awesome Marriage - Part 3
item.description: In a society that doesn’t support marriage and actually encourages people to walk out on their marriage, God wants you to fight for your marriage. Join Pastor Rick as he continues to teach about awesome marriages.

item.itunes:title: Fighting For an Awesome Marriage - Part 2
item.title: Fighting For an Awesome Marriage - Part 2
item.description: God created marriage for many reasons: to connect men and women, to protect children, and to reflect our union in Christ. Learn more reasons why God created marriage in this message by Pastor Rick.

item.itunes:title: Fighting For an Awesome Marriage - Part 1
item.title: Fighting For an Awesome Marriage - Part 1
item.description: Regardless of whether you’re married or single, the Bible says that everyone should give honor to marriage. In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches several reasons why marriage matters.

item.itunes:title: Where Best to Invest - Part 2
item.title: Where Best to Invest - Part 2
item.description: Join Pastor Rick as he continues to teach about the ways God wants you to invest in his purposes and why he wants you to store up treasure in Heaven.

item.itunes:title: Where Best to Invest - Part 1
item.title: Where Best to Invest - Part 1
item.description: In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches why investing in your character, in other believers, and in helping those in need, will yield eternal dividends.

item.itunes:title: The Habits of Financial Health - Part 3
item.title: The Habits of Financial Health - Part 3
item.description: In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches about the biblical principle of accounting, where you plan carefully how you use your money.

item.itunes:title: The Habits of Financial Health - Part 2
item.title: The Habits of Financial Health - Part 2
item.description: In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches the principle of tithing: why you need to put God first in your finances.

item.itunes:title: The Habits of Financial Health - Part 1
item.title: The Habits of Financial Health - Part 1
item.description: Join Pastor Rick as he teaches how and why God designed you to be productive in life.

item.itunes:title: The Laws of Sowing and Reaping - Part 3
item.title: The Laws of Sowing and Reaping - Part 3
item.description: In this message, Pastor Rick talks about the law of reproduction, whether good or bad, you reap what you sow in every area of your life.

item.itunes:title: The Laws of Sowing and Reaping - Part 2
item.title: The Laws of Sowing and Reaping - Part 2
item.description: In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches why you always reap in a different season than you sow and what to do while you’re waiting for God’s blessing.

item.itunes:title: The Laws of Sowing and Reaping - Part 1
item.title: The Laws of Sowing and Reaping - Part 1
item.description: Join Pastor Rick as he teaches why God requires you to first plant a seed in faith before he begins to bless your life with fruitfulness.

item.itunes:title: The Law of Contentment - Part 4
item.title: The Law of Contentment - Part 4
item.description: Pastor Rick continues to teach how to be content with what you have, where you are, and who you are in Christ.

item.itunes:title: The Law of Contentment - Part 3
item.title: The Law of Contentment - Part 3
item.description: In this message, Pastor Rick teaches how you can become possessed by your possessions. Instead, focus more on eternal priorities.

item.itunes:title: The Law of Contentment - Part 2
item.title: The Law of Contentment - Part 2
item.description: Join Pastor Rick as he teaches how contentment has nothing to do with your circumstances and everything to do with your attitude.

item.itunes:title: The Law of Contentment - Part 1
item.title: The Law of Contentment - Part 1
item.description: Join Pastor Rick as he teaches why contentment requires you stop comparing yourself to others.

item.itunes:title: The Foundation of Financial Health - Part 3
item.title: The Foundation of Financial Health - Part 3
item.description: Join Pastor Rick as he teaches how to put money mistakes behind you in order to faithfully invest in the future.

item.itunes:title: The Foundation of Financial Health - Part 2
item.title: The Foundation of Financial Health - Part 2
item.description: Everything you have belongs to God. You are only a manager of what he gives you. In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches the spiritual discipline of money management.

item.itunes:title: The Foundation of Financial Health - Part 1
item.title: The Foundation of Financial Health - Part 1
item.description: Join Pastor Rick as he teaches why God uses money to test your faith and what you need to do to pass the test.

item.itunes:title: God’s Promise to the Generous - Part 3
item.title: God’s Promise to the Generous - Part 3
item.description: Join Pastor Rick as he teaches what it means to store up treasure in heaven by making an eternal investment in others today.

item.itunes:title: God’s Promise to the Generous - Part 2
item.title: God’s Promise to the Generous - Part 2
item.description: In this broadcast, Pastor Rick explains how being generous strengthens your faith and increases your happiness.

item.itunes:title: God’s Promise to the Generous - Part 1
item.title: God’s Promise to the Generous - Part 1
item.description: Join Pastor Rick as he teaches how investing in others is the key to eternal happiness.

item.itunes:title: How to Keep from Stressing Out - Part 3
item.title: How to Keep from Stressing Out - Part 3
item.description: In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches how to replace stressful thinking with faithful thinking.

item.itunes:title: How To Keep from Stressing Out - Part 2
item.title: How To Keep from Stressing Out - Part 2
item.description: Join Pastor Rick as he teaches how to replace worry with prayer.

item.itunes:title: How to Keep from Stressing Out - Part 1
item.title: How to Keep from Stressing Out - Part 1
item.description: The Bible says, “Don’t worry about anything” (Philippians 4:6 NLT). In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches four reasons to let go of your worry.

item.itunes:title: Five Daily Habits for Happiness - Part 2
item.title: Five Daily Habits for Happiness - Part 2
item.description: In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches why focusing on what’s eternal leads to everlasting happiness.

item.itunes:title: Five Daily Habits for Happiness - Part 1
item.title: Five Daily Habits for Happiness - Part 1
item.description: Join Pastor Rick as he explains how to find happiness by relaxing in God’s grace.

item.itunes:title: Happiness Can Be Learned - Part 3
item.title: Happiness Can Be Learned - Part 3
item.description: Join Pastor Rick as he teaches about skills you should learn if you want to work happily with other people.

item.itunes:title: Happiness Can Be Learned - Part 2
item.title: Happiness Can Be Learned - Part 2
item.description: In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches how developing a reputation of reliability will increase your happiness.

item.itunes:title: Happiness Can Be Learned - Part 1
item.title: Happiness Can Be Learned - Part 1
item.description: Join Pastor Rick as he teaches why the starting point for greater happiness is when you shift the focus away from yourself.

item.itunes:title: How to Keep Your Heart Happy - Part 3
item.title: How to Keep Your Heart Happy - Part 3
item.description: In this message, Pastor Rick teaches why following Jesus is essential to experiencing lasting happiness.

item.itunes:title: How to Keep Your Heart Happy - Part 2
item.title: How to Keep Your Heart Happy - Part 2
item.description: Join Pastor Rick as he teaches, if you want to find lasting happiness, you have to change the way you think.

item.itunes:title: How to Keep Your Heart Happy - Part 1
item.title: How to Keep Your Heart Happy - Part 1
item.description: God is with you, he is in you, and he is for you. In this message, Pastor Rick explains why those three truths can help you pushback against depression and discouragement—and to find happiness.

item.itunes:title: The Humble Path to Happiness - Part 3
item.title: The Humble Path to Happiness - Part 3
item.description: Join Pastor Rick as he teaches how to overcome defeat, bitterness, and resentment by asking the question, “What would Jesus do?”

item.itunes:title: The Humble Path to Happiness - Part 2
item.title: The Humble Path to Happiness - Part 2
item.description: In this message, Pastor Rick explains the importance of paying attention to the people around you: “Do not be interested only in your own life, but be interested in the lives of others” (Philippians 2:4 NCV).

item.itunes:title: The Humble Path to Happiness - Part 1
item.title: The Humble Path to Happiness - Part 1
item.description: Join Pastor Rick as he teaches how to stop pride from undermining your happiness.

item.itunes:title: How to Be Happy No Matter What - Part 3
item.title: How to Be Happy No Matter What - Part 3
item.description: In this message, Pastor Rick teaches that happiness comes from service and giving your life away.

item.itunes:title: How to Be Happy No Matter What - Part 2
item.title: How to Be Happy No Matter What - Part 2
item.description: Join Pastor Rick as he explains how the Bible teaches you can be as happy as you choose to be!

item.itunes:title: How to Be Happy No Matter What - Part 1
item.title: How to Be Happy No Matter What - Part 1
item.description: Pastor Rick teaches how to find happiness by learning to see things from God’s point of view. You can face any problem with faith when you ask, “What is God doing here? What’s the bigger picture?”

item.itunes:title: Grow Healthy Relationships - Part 3
item.title: Grow Healthy Relationships - Part 3
item.description: In this broadcast, Pastor Rick explains how positive prayer builds stronger relationships. Instead of trying to change others, we let God do his work in them.

item.itunes:title: Grow Healthy Relationships - Part 2
item.title: Grow Healthy Relationships - Part 2
item.description: By focusing on the good in a relationship, you’ll help the relationship grow healthy. Join Pastor Rick for this lesson from Philippians.

item.itunes:title: Grow Healthy Relationships - Part 1
item.title: Grow Healthy Relationships - Part 1
item.description: If you want to have healthy relationships, start with an attitude of gratitude. In this message, Pastor Rick teaches how to develop the habit of being grateful for the people in your life.

item.itunes:title: The Awesome Power of Faith - Part 3
item.title: The Awesome Power of Faith - Part 3
item.description: Failure is never final. You’re never a failure until you quit, and it’s always too soon to quit! In this broadcast, Pastor Rick explains what the Bible says about how we can overcome discouragement as we patiently wait to see God work in our lives.

item.itunes:title: The Awesome Power of Faith - Part 2
item.title: The Awesome Power of Faith - Part 2
item.description: Proverbs 29:25 says, “Fear of man will prove to be a snare, but whoever trusts in the Lord is kept safe” (NIV). We cannot serve God and be constantly worried about what other people think. In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches what the Bible says about how we can overcome the fear of failure and move forward in our God-given purpose.

item.itunes:title: The Awesome Power of Faith - Part 1
item.title: The Awesome Power of Faith - Part 1
item.description: Faith is choosing and believing God’s dream for your life. Nothing starts happening in your life until you start dreaming. In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches three things the Bible says we can do as we walk forward in faith toward God’s plan for our lives.

item.itunes:title: The Amazing Power of Forgiveness - Part 3
item.title: The Amazing Power of Forgiveness - Part 3
item.description: True forgiveness doesn’t make sense until you have been forgiven by God. In this message, Pastor Rick shares the four things you have to do to truly forgive others. “God has done it all! He sent Christ to make peace between himself and us, and he has given us the work of making peace between himself and others” (2 Corinthians 5:18).

item.itunes:title: The Amazing Power of Forgiveness - Part 2
item.title: The Amazing Power of Forgiveness - Part 2
item.description: Forgiveness is not resuming a relationship without change. In fact, forgiveness and resuming a relationship are two different things. In this message, Pastor Rick shares three things that the Bible says are essential to resume a relationship that’s been broken.

item.itunes:title: The Amazing Power of Forgiveness - Part 1
item.title: The Amazing Power of Forgiveness - Part 1
item.description: What is real forgiveness? In this broadcast, Pastor Rick explains what it means to you that forgiveness is unconditional and that it isn’t minimizing the seriousness of the offense. The Bible says in Luke 23:34, “Father, forgive them, for they do not know what they are doing.”

item.itunes:title: Winning with the Hand You’re Dealt - Part 4
item.title: Winning with the Hand You’re Dealt - Part 4
item.description: The freedom to choose is our greatest blessing from God, but that also means we may make foolish choices that harm us and harm the people around us. In this broadcast, Pastor Rick helps you understand that your identity is shaped by your choices. He shows you how to make choices that will positively affect the rest of your life.

item.itunes:title: Winning with the Hand You’re Dealt - Part 3
item.title: Winning with the Hand You’re Dealt - Part 3
item.description: Proverbs 4:23 says, “Be careful how you think; your life is shaped by your thoughts” (GNT). Your circumstances and consciousness have shaped who you are. In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches how the Bible says the way we respond to our circumstances and the thoughts we choose to believe will shape our lives.

item.itunes:title: Winning with the Hand You’re Dealt - Part 2
item.title: Winning with the Hand You’re Dealt - Part 2
item.description: Life is not about your accomplishments or acquisitions, your popularity or prestige. It’s about how well you love. In this broadcast, Pastor Rick talks about three problems that can keep us from fully and deeply loving others, and he teaches what the Bible says about overcoming these obstacles.

item.itunes:title: Winning with the Hand You’re Dealt - Part 1
item.title: Winning with the Hand You’re Dealt - Part 1
item.description: In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches from the Bible that we will never be able to make the necessary changes in our lives or fulfill God’s purpose until we understand that we are wonderfully complex and uniquely made for God’s glory.

item.itunes:title: God’s Prescription for Health - Part 2
item.title: God’s Prescription for Health - Part 2
item.description: In this broadcast, Pastor Rick continues to teach the principles of health management that are available to you in God’s Word.

item.itunes:title: God’s Prescription for Health - Part 1
item.title: God’s Prescription for Health - Part 1
item.description: If a pill guaranteed to add years to your life, would you pay a lot of money for it? The Bible says that you already have the key to a long life — and that it’s free! In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches the principles of health management that are available to you in God’s Word.

item.itunes:title: What It Takes to Really Change - Part 3
item.title: What It Takes to Really Change - Part 3
item.description: If you want to experience lasting change in your life, start by humbly assessing your situation and admitting you don’t have it all together. Join Pastor Rick as he explains what the Bible says about the importance of honesty and transparency in the steps toward change.

item.itunes:title: What It Takes to Really Change - Part 2
item.title: What It Takes to Really Change - Part 2
item.description: In this broadcast, Pastor Rick talks about the biblical approach to making changes in your life that will last. One key to transformation is changing the way you think.

item.itunes:title: What It Takes to Really Change - Part 1
item.title: What It Takes to Really Change - Part 1
item.description: For change to happen in any area of your life — whether it’s financial, vocational, educational, mental, or relational —begin with the physical. In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches what the apostle Paul meant when he said “offer your bodies as a living sacrifice, holy and pleasing to God” (Romans 12:1).

item.itunes:title: Setting Goals in Faith - Part 3
item.title: Setting Goals in Faith - Part 3
item.description: The truth is, there are goals God doesn’t want you to accomplish. In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches about the kind of goals that God blesses and how your goals can bring glory to God.

item.itunes:title: Setting Goals in Faith - Part 2
item.title: Setting Goals in Faith - Part 2
item.description: Faith means doing things that you can’t do without God’s help. In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches a biblical approach to setting goals that are bigger than those you can reach on your own.

item.itunes:title: Setting Goals in Faith - Part 1
item.title: Setting Goals in Faith - Part 1
item.description: When you set goals, you are making a statement of faith. In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches a biblical approach to setting goals that will challenge your faith, develop your character, and build your hope.

item.itunes:title: Getting Your Ship out of the Harbor - Part 2
item.title: Getting Your Ship out of the Harbor - Part 2
item.description: Join Pastor Rick as he explains what may impact your ability to achieve your dreams and what the Bible says about getting past any excuses.

item.itunes:title: Getting Your Ship out of the Harbor - Part 1
item.title: Getting Your Ship out of the Harbor - Part 1
item.description: It would be a tragedy to build a ship and never set sail. In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches how you can seize the moment and act on your godly dreams in order to fulfill God’s plan for your life.

item.itunes:title: Why We Need Each Other - Part 3
item.title: Why We Need Each Other - Part 3
item.description: In this message, Pastor Rick teaches how God wants us to look out for others and to watch out for their spiritual welfare.

item.itunes:title: Why We Need Each Other - Part 2
item.title: Why We Need Each Other - Part 2
item.description: In this broadcast, Pastor Rick teaches why the Bible says we need to work with other believers to do good works.
